md:
giải nghĩa từ "caption" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Caption (noun) - Tiêu đề, chú thích

* Meaning: A caption is a title or explanation that is written above or below a picture, diagram, or other visual image.
* Example sentence: The caption under the photo read "Summer vacation 2020".
* Related words: title, heading, label, subtitle
* Antonyms: none

Caption (verb) - Đặt tiêu đề, viết chú thích

* Meaning: To caption something means to add a title or explanation to it.
* Example sentence: The photographer captioned the photo with the date and location.
* Related words: title, label, describe, annotate
* Antonyms: none

Note: The word "caption" can also refer to the text that is displayed on a screen to provide a translation or transcription of spoken words, such as in a movie or TV show. This sense of the word is not as commonly used in everyday conversation.
